## Conversation that answers the provided questions:
**User:**
Hey there, I'm interested in learning more about the Verus testnet. Can you tell me about its current status and how it relates to the mainnet?

**AI Assistant:**
The Verus testnet is a fully decentralized blockchain network that is currently running with 50% proof of work and 50% proof of stake. It has worldwide availability and is testing all of the new Verus protocols that will eventually be implemented on the mainnet. The testnet currencies and assets have no value and may be reset at any time for testing purposes.

**User:**
That sounds interesting! How can I access the Verus testnet and try out the new protocols?

**AI Assistant:**
You can access the Verus testnet by visiting the Verus Discord and asking for a representative basket of Verus testnet currencies in the #pbaas-development channel. You can join the Verus Discord using this link: https://discord.gg/gecZsCf.

**User:**
What are some of the new capabilities and blockchain firsts being tested on the Verus testnet?

**AI Assistant:**
The Verus testnet is testing a range of new capabilities, including DeFi and cross-currency liquidity integrated with blockchain processing, fees, VerusID, and Verus PoP, as well as a 51% hash-attack resistant consensus algorithm. These capabilities have the potential to improve and reshape the DeFi industry.

**User:**
That sounds like a lot of exciting developments! What is the significance of the new Verus protocols being tested on the testnet?

**AI Assistant:**
The new Verus protocols being tested on the testnet are a massive set of platform capabilities that take DeFi further than any project in crypto today. They have the potential to revolutionize the industry, but understanding their implications will require a process of realization, similar to peeling back the layers of an onion.
What is the current status of the Verus testnet, and how does it relate to the mainnet?

The Verus testnet is a fully decentralized blockchain network that is currently running with 50% proof of work and 50% proof of stake. It has worldwide availability and is testing all of the new Verus protocols that will eventually be implemented on the mainnet. The testnet currencies and assets have no value and may be reset at any time for testing purposes.

This is the most groundbreaking testnet the Verus project has ever released, and we believe it holds the potential to improve and reshape the DeFi industry. There are truly so many new capabilities and blockchain firsts working now on testnet that it’s hard to adequately cover them all. Below is a list of new capabilities active on the v0.7.2 testnet that will be on mainnet in the near future when considered fully hardened, tested, and ready for worldwide, public scale. Until then, Verus testnet is a fully decentralized blockchain network with 50% proof of work, 50% proof of stake, worldwide availability, and is running all of the new Verus protocols that are being tested and hardened for mainnet. All currencies and assets on the Verus testnet have absolutely no value and may be reset at any time in the interest of testing for mainnet. If you would like a representative basket of Verus testnet currencies that you can use to try out all of the new protocols from anywhere in the world, simply visit the Verus Discord and ask in the #pbaas-development channel.
